settings.description_content:
Snuggle into the spirit of the outback with our Aussie Adventure Ribbed Two-Piece PJs! Crafted from our signature snuggle-soft bamboo fabric, this set brings the unique charm of Australian wildlife to bedtime.

settings.story_content:
Meet Kiki the koala and Joey the kangaroo, two adorable friends who love to explore the Australian wilderness! Through their adventures, little ones discover the magic of marsupials â€“ from koalas' sleepy nature to kangaroos' playful hops. Each piece comes with a free storybook featuring Kiki and Joey's journey, plus fun facts about Australia and a multilingual guide that teaches the classic Aussie greeting "G'day".
Because bedtime is just another opportunity for adventure!

settings.section_subtitle: Discover A World Where Every Little Outfit Is Made With Love, Care.

settings.feature_1_text: Tough enough for hand-me-down adventures, soft enough for first-time snuggles.
settings.feature_2_text: Each piece comes with its own adventure tale, growing curious minds while they grow.
settings.feature_3_text: Earth-friendly materials and practices, because today crawlers deserve tomorrow world.
settings.feature_4_text: Gender-neutral designs that celebrate childhood, not stereotypes.

settings.text: As steady as the mountains and as soft as morning grass, our earth-toned zippy keeps your little adventurer cozy through every discovery.

settings.heading: How do you ensure quality?Â
settings.row_content: We'rekind of obsessed with quality (in a good way). Every piece goes through more tests than your toddler's "but why?" phase. Our snuggle-soft fabric is carefully selected, our stitching is marathon-ready, and we check, double-check, and triple-check everything before it heads to your home. Because the only surprises we want are the good kind!

settings.heading: Where are your products made?Â
settings.row_content: Our clothes are lovingly created by skilled artisans who share our passion for doing things right. We've handpicked partners who treat their people fairly and our planet kindly. Think of it as a friendship bracelet between ethics and awesome clothes â€“ we wouldn't have it any other way.

settings.heading: How do I know what size to purchase?Â
settings.row_content: Ah, the eternal question! While we can't predict your little one's next growth spurt (wouldn't that be nice?), we've got a super-detailed size guide that comes pretty close. Pro tip: When in doubt, size up â€“ those tiny humans have a sneaky habit of growing overnight! Check out our size chart below for the full scoop.

settings.heading: Does Short Stuff clothing shrink?
settings.row_content: Nope! Our clothes are pre-shrunk and ready to tackle endless wash cycles (because we know about those unexpected spaghetti incidents). Just follow the care instructions, and your Short Stuff will stay looking fresh through all of life's little adventures.

settings.heading: Do you have a size chart?
settings.row_content: Of course! We've made our size chart crystal clear because nobody has time for complicated math while shopping with a baby on their hip. You'll find measurements for every age range, making it easier than a baby's nap schedule (okay, maybe not that easy, but close!). Check each product page or hit up our Size Guide section.
